docs.snippet: Fans at next year's World Cup and this year's Confederations Cup in Russia will need special identity cards before they can watch matches, soccer's governing body said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans at next year's World Cup and this year's Confederations Cup in Russia will need special identity cards before they can watch matches, soccer's governing body said Thursday.

headline.main: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches

docs.snippet: The American Civil Liberties Union on Thursday called for an investigation into whether Attorney General Jeff Sessions perjured himself during a confirmation hearing in which he denied having contacts with Russians during the U.S. presidential cam...

docs.snippet: A western Pennsylvania gymnastics coach convicted of sexually abusing three former students wasn't allowed to remain free on bond until sentencing after the judge learned he had been holding hands with another teen student during jury deliberation...
docs.lead_paragraph: A western Pennsylvania gymnastics coach convicted of sexually abusing three former students wasn't allowed to remain free on bond until sentencing after the judge learned he had been holding hands with another teen student during jury deliberations.

headline.main: Coach Holds Hands With Teen as Jury Decides Sex Abuse Case
headline.print_headline: Coach Holds Hands With Teen as Jury Decides Sex Abuse Case

docs.snippet: Smartphones have replaced lots of other accessories — cameras, flashlights, calculators. But many people are still reluctant to swap the wallets in their pockets for their digital counterparts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Smartphones have replaced lots of other accessories — cameras, flashlights, calculators. But many people are still reluctant to swap the wallets in their pockets for their digital counterparts.

docs.snippet: Turkey is ruling out compromise with the United States over the involvement of Kurdish militia fighters in an assault in Syria, an obstacle for Washington's plan to deploy its strongest allies on the ground in a decisive showdown with Islamic Stat...
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey is ruling out compromise with the United States over the involvement of Kurdish militia fighters in an assault in Syria, an obstacle for Washington's plan to deploy its strongest allies on the ground in a decisive showdown with Islamic State.

headline.main: Turkey, U.S. on Collision Course Over Kurdish Role in Battle for Syria's Raqqa
headline.print_headline: Turkey, U.S. on Collision Course Over Kurdish Role in Battle for Syria's Raqqa
